attributes.action: choice to bring baby home after miscarriage,stillborn at any gestation to give them a resting place
attributes.additional_details: for all women to  be able to bring there baby home from hospital at any gestation in there pregnacey to give them a resting place for the babys, (home,crem,church) as it states from 24 weeks preg you are able to lay your child to rest, but a heartbeat is formed between 5-6 weeks ges. every women should have the choice, not be told we will dispose of the body for you i.e CLINICAL WASTE!! every women should have the choice whether to leave the baby with the hospital or bring the baby home, i have over 5000 members on my fb page a lot did not get the choice and are heartbroken, this needs to change!
